name: Bubble Pop Classic
description: Bubble Pop Classic is a fascinating bubble shooter game with a stage-based style, each with its challenge!

name: Crazy Motorcycle
description: An exciting motorcycle racing game with challenging tracks and stunts!

name: Stumble Guys
description: A multiplayer knockout game with up to 32 players online competing through obstacle courses until one victor remains!

name: Moto X3M
description: A popular bike racing game with 25 challenging levels. Race up and down hills, jump over obstacles, and perform stunts in this action-packed game!
